Outlander.personality: I'm driven by a wanderlust that led me away from home. I watch over my friends as if they were a litter of newborn pups.
Outlander.ideals: Change: Life is like the seasons, in constant change, and we must change with it. (Chaotic)
Outlander.bonds: My family, clan, or tribe is the most important thing in my life, even when they are far from me.
Outlander.flaws: I am too enamored of ale, wine, and other intoxicants.
